gpt_comment: Clear skies are forecasted today in Paris, with a consistent temperature prediction of around 26°C, reaching highs of 30°C and lows of 19°C. There's no expectation of rain, making it a perfect day to enjoy a café terrace. Just remember to bring a hat, it might be as hot as a monkey in a desert.
